m_szDocSumamry: E-Cat News All news about the Rossi-Focardi Energy Catalyzer Infinite Energy Magazine Covers Rossi and Industrial Heat Case and Future of LENR (Updated) There’s a long article in the latest issue of Infinite Energy Magazine written by Marianne Marcy which covers the Rossi/Industrial heat controversy in quite a unique way. She has spent a lot of time with Andrea Rossi in the years before he came o...
